title: Global Timer Watch Face
summary: Make your choice of three different time zones of the world to be viewed unified
description: Truly a smart way of viewing the World Time is here; Just a glance at your watch is enough to know the Current time, date, month and day for three different Time zones. Are you in need to view different countries Time in an instant without switching back, then definitely Global Timer Watch Face is for you folks.What you feel:★	The entire globe at your wrist.★	Stunningly designed to amaze you.★	Keep track of various time zones.★	Just a glance is enough.What is Unique?★	Combined view of three country time.★	Displays battery status of phone and watch.★	Displays month, date and day.★	Displays your current locations weather. (Celsius, Fahrenheit & Kelvin)★	Color variants as per your mood.Just a Click:To know more about Global Timer Watch Face,Visit: http://insideglobe.com/global-timer-watch-face/Share Your Idea:If you wish to suggest us your idea of any additional widgets, Please contact us at (wearables@insideglobe.com)Note: The watch Faces is not for all the smart watches but only android wear watches paired with android phone(4.3+)Requires Android Wear - supports the following watches :• Motorola 360 (1st , 2nd gen and sport)• Huawei Watch• ASUS Zen Watch 2• LG G Watch• LG G Watch R• TAG Heuer Connected• Fossil Q Founder• LG Watch Urbane• Sony Smart Watch 3• Samsung Gear Live
descriptionHTML:
Truly a smart way of viewing the World Time is here; Just a glance at your watch is enough to know the Current time, date, month and day for three different Time zones. Are you in need to view different countries Time in an instant without switching back, then definitely Global Timer Watch Face is for you folks.

What you feel:
★ The entire globe at your wrist.
★ Stunningly designed to amaze you.
★ Keep track of various time zones.
★ Just a glance is enough.

What is Unique?
★ Combined view of three country time.
★ Displays battery status of phone and watch.
★ Displays month, date and day.
★ Displays your current locations weather. (Celsius, Fahrenheit & Kelvin)
★ Color variants as per your mood.

Just a Click:
To know more about Global Timer Watch Face,
Visit: http://insideglobe.com/global-timer-watch-face/

Share Your Idea:
If you wish to suggest us your idea of any additional widgets, Please contact us at (wearables@insideglobe.com)

Note: The watch Faces is not for all the smart watches but only android wear watches paired with android phone(4.3+)
Requires Android Wear - supports the following watches :
• Motorola 360 (1st , 2nd gen and sport)
• Huawei Watch
• ASUS Zen Watch 2
• LG G Watch
• LG G Watch R
• TAG Heuer Connected
• Fossil Q Founder
• LG Watch Urbane
• Sony Smart Watch 3
• Samsung Gear Live
comments: SPAM APP DO NOT INSTALL WILL SPAM YOU TO BUY THEIR OTJER APPS DO NOT INSTALL. Miss some configuration items such as how long I want the screen to stay on. Also, main issue is that there's just not enough cities!!!

Not bad, needs more customization Not bad. Lacking some customization, for example weather needs an option for Fahrenheit. User-defined color settings seems easy to implement and would be nice too. Update: big battery drain, uninstalled.
Cluttered and unreadable and the colors are brighter and not refined at all on the watch, it looks like an incomplete idea with old design
Not reflecting on watch.  Not button or option in app to set it to watch
